metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27221 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse OpenJ9 up to and including version 0.23, there is potential for a stack-based buffer overflow when the virtual machine or JNI natives are converting from UTF-8 characters to platform encoding.

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
